text: So This Is Arizona is a 1931 American western film directed by J.P. McGowan and starring Hal Taliaferro, Fred Church and Buzz Barton.Pitts p.66 ==Cast== * Hal Taliaferro as Bob Ransome * Don Wilson as Wobbly * Fred Church as Jake McKeever * Lorraine LaVal as Josie Gerrard * Tete Brady as Hattie McKeever * Buzz Barton as Buzz * Gus Anderson as Sheriff * Joe Lawliss as Henchman ==References== ==Bibliography== * Michael R. Pitts. Poverty Row Studios, 1929–1940: An Illustrated History of 55 Independent Film Companies, with a Filmography for Each. McFarland & Company, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1931 films Category:1931 Western (genre) films Category:English- language films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by J. P. McGowan
title: So This Is Arizona
